title: Duke - Interior & architectural WordPress theme (Creative)
text:
Add to Collection 
Most WordPress themes in the market follow similar design patterns, having a long homepage which the visitors need to keep scrolling for decades, as in the site has nothing but a homepage. However, unlike other themes in the market, Duke WordPress theme focuses on minimalist homepage with a splash slider homepage. 
The splash homepage works just like a book cover, which represents the book, but has almost no details about the book. Yet covers and blurbs can attact the readers a big deal that the first page of the book itself can’t. Similarly the splash homepage allows you to grab the attention of your visitor with a few catchy lines and showcase images. Then once you’ve grabbed the attention, the visitors will crave to see the rest of your site themselves. This way, you can easily run past your competitors who use regular designs with loads of information on the homepage making their site boring for the visitors to go through, rather than grabbing attention on the first page. 
Alongside the splash homepage feature, Duke WordPress theme has all other features that you would like to have in a business WordPress theme. Drag and Drop page builder, Slick design, Uncommon design patterns everywhere, etc. make the theme outstanding in all aspects – in short, a perfect theme for your business, be it a small or a large one.
